name: Dust Rush: Vacuum Adventure
description:
Dust Rush is a shelved game intended for mobile devices. Made with Polyfruit Studios LTD. 
Collect as much dust as you can before the time runs out!

Control your adorably cute Vacuum around multiple 3D levels jam-packed with fully interactive physics-based objects, avoiding obstacles and racing to a ‘clean’ finish by collecting as many dust clumps as possible.

Use bounce pads to land on higher platforms, suck up keys to open doors, and grab handy Batteries and Magnets to maximise your score. With exciting re-playable levels and easy-to-learn controls, Dust Rush is both a simulation of robotic vacuums and a quirky adventure. Your Vacuum can be customised with different colours, patterns and hats too!

Incredibly simple to play with just one hand - hold your finger on the screen to stop & rotate your Vacuum, then release it to move it forward!

Features:
- A cute and humorous exploration game with an adorable robot Vacuum
- Easy to learn controls that anyone can pick up and play!
- Multiple creative 3D levels of cleaning time-based fun
- Unlockable hats, colours & patterns for you to customize your Vacuum
- You can even pet the Vacuum, for doing a good job

We hope you enjoy the game!

--------------------------------------

CONTROLS

Use ← → arrow keys or  tap the left and right of the screen to change direction
